description:
Transform your bottles or water storage bags into a filtration solution that you can always rely on. Removes bacteria and protozoa for safe drinking from backcountry sources.

  • Fits flexible bottles, running flasks, and water storage bags that have a 42mm opening
  • High-flow twist nozzle can be open and closed with one hand, so water is always at the ready
  • Filter life is approximately 1500L
name: Hydrapak 42 mm Filter Cap
